constituent: 1 (one), samurai, crown, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisigStory: The Roman numeral I - like that for II we met earlier in frame 379 - is only rarely used now. In the midst of all the samurai, we notice one in particular sitting on the ground with a crown on his head, indicating that he is "number I" in the current rankings.
koohiiStory1: I am ´the one´ , says the samurai with the crown around his waist and a spoon up his a***.
koohiiStory2: The samurai who has been crowned number one is so good he uses a spoon to fight with rather than a sword.
myStory: một. kẻ sĩ cầm thìa dưới bàn là 1
